div.pre: 878 Sozopol (anc. Apollonia Pontica), SE of Burgas, Bulgaria, 1947 Burial: 3rd cent. B.C. or later (T) Contents: 8 AR, 55 AE, Apollonia Pontica: 8 tetrob.; 55 AE Disposition: Sofia Gerasimov, BIAB 17 (1950), p. 322 Excavations of the ancient necropolis; one grave contained 1 tetrob. and 53 AE, and another 7 tetrob. and 2 AE
